idea-plugin.name: CRP XML Debugger
idea-plugin.description:
CRP XML Debugger adds debugging support for XML-based model such as BPMN and CMMN executed in java. It enables developers to set breakpoints directly in XML files and connect them to corresponding Java code, simplifying the analysis of model executions like Flowable, Camunda, and Activiti. Features:
  • Add breakpoints directly in BPMN/CMMN XML files
  • Conditional breakpoints based on execution attributes
  • Synchronization with Java code execution
